metadata.title: CVE-2022-40303 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libxml2 before 2.10.3. When parsing amulti-gigabyte XML document with the XML_PARSE_HUGE parser option enabled,several integer counters can overflow. This results in an attempt to accessan array at a negative 2GB offset, typically leading to a segmentationfault.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40303` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.8
libxml2-utils - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.8
python-libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.8
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.8').
